name: Color-Tilt
description:
Tap the color and tilt your phone to clear a series of falling blocks! The rounds start easy, but speed up quickly. Play along to thrilling soundtracks while you compete for number one spot on the leaderboards.

Choose between three different SPEED settings with more modes on the way.
View the source code, music, and leave feedback via the INFO link in the menu.
THEMES coming soon.

Music by Premiumbeat, Art-List, Epedemic Sound, and Zapsplat.
Code and artwork by Scott Bera.
